titleStmt.title: The vvidovves ioy. Or Christ his comfortable saluation to a comfortlesse widow being obseruations no lesse profitable then comfortable for the losse of our deceased friends. By W.C.
titleStmt.author: Cragge, William, 1595 or 6-1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Bill] for Iohn Hodgets,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
